Package breadmakesense

Class MainWindowLogic

java.lang.Object
breadmakesense.MainWindowLogic
public class MainWindowLogic extends Object
Logic behind the MainWindowFX. Does all the calculations and the updates of the variables.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jan PÃ©rez, Joel Ferrer

  • Field Details

    • autoClickTimer

      static Timer autoClickTimer

    • uploadServerDataTimer

      static Timer uploadServerDataTimer

    • userID

      static int userID

    • breads

      static double breads
      Variable that saves the quantity of breads the user has. While the user will only see an integer, internally we save the breads with decimals. This way the bread counter goes smoothly and we can calculate more complex operations like the ascend system. This also applies to legacybreads

    • legacyBreads

      static double legacyBreads
      Total of breads the user has produced over all time. Donations doesn't count

    • ascend

      static float ascend
      This value is multiplied with all sources of breads (clicks and upgrades)

    • breadsClick

      static int breadsClick
      Quantity of breads generated with one click

    • breadsClickAuto

      static float breadsClickAuto
      Value added to the total of breads every time the timer (autoClickTimer) is executed

    • breadsPerSecond

      static float breadsPerSecond
      Calculation of breads per second. For technical reasons this value can be not accurate with reality

    • AUTO_SAVE_TIME

      private static final int AUTO_SAVE_TIME
      Time it takes to run a upload to the server. NOTE: this value can't be increased because of the limitations of the server. Doing so will result in a disconnection mid-game. Losing all contact with the server and not being able to save data
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • items

      static int[] items

    • ITEMS_PRICE_DEFAULT

      static final int[] ITEMS_PRICE_DEFAULT
      Default price for the items, just for reference to re-calculate the price of the items when downloading data

    • itemsPrice

      static int[] itemsPrice

    • ITEMS_PRICE_RISE

      private static final float ITEMS_PRICE_RISE
      Every time the user buys an item it's price is multiplied by this value

    • buyItem

      public static boolean buyItem(byte item)
      When the shop buttons are pressed and the amount of breads owned are sufficient buys an item.
      Parameters:
      item - Id from the item
      Returns:
      True when the item has been buyed and False when not.

    • calculateBreadsSecond

      public static void calculateBreadsSecond()
      Calculates the breads per second generated.

    • initalizeAutoClickTimer

      public static void initalizeAutoClickTimer()
      Sum the breads per frame to the total breads owned.

    • initalizeUploadDataTimer

      public static void initalizeUploadDataTimer()
      Starts the timer to upload all the client data to the database automatically.
